entry.title: 3M Attest 1296 - Attest Rapid Readout Biological indicator Test Packs For 250°F/121°C Gravity & 270°F/132°C Vacuum Assisted Steam Sterilizers 7000002696
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Indicators
Price: 381.53

[shortdesc]

3M Attest Rapid Readout Biological Indicator Test Pack, 1296, for 250°F/121°C Gravity and 270°F/132°C Vacuum Assisted Steam Sterilizers

  • 3M™ Attest™ Rapid Readout Biological Indicator Test Packs 1296 are for steam 250°F/121°C gravity displacement or 270°F/132°C vacuum assisted sterilization cycles
  • Includes 25 test packs and 25 controls.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Attest
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Indicators

    Product Information

  • Biological indicator vials are easy to use and interpret
  • Self-contained biological indicators significantly reduce possibility of contamination, minimizing false positives and assuring more accurate results
  • Visual readout in 3 hours
